projects.name: Whatsapp chat analysis
projects.description: Spearheaded the creation of an innovative Stremlit application designed to analyze WhatsApp chat data with precision and efficiency, employing advanced analytics techniques and interactive visualizations. Engineered and deployed sophisticated data processing algorithms within the Stremlit app, enabling in-depth analysis of chat conversations, sentiment analysis, word frequency tracking, and user engagement metrics, empowering stakeholders with actionable insights. Crafted an intuitive and user-friendly interface for the Stremlit app, facilitating seamless navigation and interaction with analytical insights derived from WhatsApp chat data, empowering users to make informed decisions and derive meaningful conclusions.

projects.name: Namma Yatri-Replication of Namma Yatri app
projects.description: Orchestrated creation of a dynamic Power BI dashboard replicating Bengalurus Namma Yatri app, seamlessly integrating Excel and SQL data for comprehensive analysis. Employed commanding KPIs, gauge charts, dynamic line charts, amalgamated tables, interactive maps, and slicers to vividly illustrate performance metrics, conversion rates, trends, and expansive geographical reach. Streamlined data integration by synergizing and transforming multiple datasets within Power Query Editor, enabling exhaustive analysis of ride, user, and geographical data.

projects.name: Data InsightX
projects.description: Performed data loading, cleaning, manipulation. Performed EDA using NumPy, Pandas and Matplotlib. Identifying KPIs to improve the customer experience across different States, Occupation and age groups.

experiences.description: Successfully supervised and coordinated the entire group of dramatics society(50+members) at various inter-college fests. Lead a group of 30 members in the event of dramatics in the annual cultural fest of NIT Jamshedpur CULFEST.

experiences.role_name: Industrial and Alumni Relation Student Coordinator
experiences.description: Promoted fund targets of NITJAA (NIT Jamshedpur Alumni Association) among NIT Jamshedpur alumni with a success rate of 85%. Volunteered 200+ alumni in Alumni meet23 under Event Management team.
